content: DSW 2005-TS Wire sawing conversion kit Wire saw kit for converting the DST 20-CA wall saw ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Diamond wire and wall saws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quick adaptation of the DST 20-CA wall saw from cutting with circular blades to diamond wires Smoother and easier to start when used with the dedicated software Robust and compact system Applications Cutting through thick components Cutting rectangular openings (doors, windows and shafts etc.) without the over-cut corners left by a circular blade Small structural modifications (cutting through columns and beams) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Power source: Electric Min. generator power: 40 kVA Wire storage capacity: 220.47 in Technical Data | Power source | Electric | Min. generator power | 40 kVA | Wire storage capacity | 220.47 in | Weight | 105000 | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 85 dB (A) | 1 | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3921102 - DSW 2005-TS 60mm Wire Saw - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSW 2005-TS kit Wire saw assy - 1x Drive wheel DSW 2005-TS
